code:
import turtle

t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pencolor('white')


while True:
    t1.forward(50)
    t1.right(9)
    t1.backward(50)
    t1.left(20)

guide.img: Let's learn about patterns, we can mismatch some angles and come up with different and interesting patterns.
We are going to use a while true loop in this case since we want this loop to keep on running

guide.img: Now let's make it tilt a little left by some degrees, and repeat these steps again and again. this will create an interesting pattern.
guide.code:
import turtle
t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pencolor('white')

while True:
   t1.forward(50)
   t1.right(9)
   t1.backward(50)
